title: Jess Shears and Dom Lever pose together for the first time after welcoming new baby
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Jessica Shears and Dom Lever have shared a sweet snap after becoming first-time parents.

Appearing to love their new mummy and daddy status, the genetically-blessed pair, both 26, snapped a selfie together where they radiated happiness.

Modelling glowing tans, the couple can be seen snuggling up together as they posed for the cute image that Jessica shared with her 1.3 million Instagram followers on Sunday afternoon.

Their first sponsored Instagram post since the birth of their new baby was captioned: "Mum and dad" alongside a plug for timepieces.

The Love Island 2017 stars, who only brought their new addition home yesterday, are yet to share the gender or name of baby Lever.

(Image: Instagram)

Earlier in the day, Jess flaunted her flat post-partum stomach.

Model and reality star Jess has wasted no time in getting back into her gruelling fitness regime following the birth.

Despite being in labour just a day or two ago, she is already in the gym and so is Dom.

He posted a photo on his Instagram of the couple in workout gear at the gym, with Jess lying on the floor mid sit-up.

Her stomach looks completely flat despite having had a huge baby bump not long ago.

She also posted a video of her holding her new baby, her t shirt tied up around the waist to reveal her incredible figure.

(Image: Instagram)

Jess shared a snap of her bundle of joy's tiny feet and a glimpse of their face in a sweet post, writing: "Baby Lever."

Dom posted a photo of himself seemingly leaving the hospital with their little one in a car seat.

He said: "Baby we did it."

description: The new parents have shared a cute couples snap days after welcoming their newborn
